alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 07 at 2:52PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following counties, Glades, Hendry and Palm Beach. * WHEN...Until 600 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 251 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to slow thunderstorms. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen from these slow moving storms during the last hour. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area during the next couple of hours. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. If the rainfall amounts increase more than forecast, then a Flash Flood Warning may be needed for this area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Belle Glade, Clewiston, Pahokee, South Bay, Lake Harbor, Canal Point, Belle Glade Camp, Okeelanta, Fremd Village- Padgett Island and Harlem. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report flooding to your local law enforcement agency when you can do so safely.
